# Interface EdgeOptions

Interface for edge options.

interface EdgeOptions {  
condition?: [EdgeConditionCallback](/types/graph_edge_condition_executor.EdgeConditionCallback);  
optional?: boolean;  
}

##### Index

### Properties

condition? optional?

## Properties

### `Optional`condition

condition?: [EdgeConditionCallback](/types/graph_edge_condition_executor.EdgeConditionCallback)

Callback function to determine if the edge condition is met. If provided, the edge will only be executed if this condition returns true.

### `Optional`optional

optional?: boolean

If true, the edge is considered optional. If the edge condition is not met, the graph execution will continue without this edge.

### Settings

Member Visibility

  * Protected
  * Inherited
  * External
